## lineLineIntersection() function

In Euclidean geometry, the intersection of a line and a line can be the empty set, a point, or a line.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function lineLineIntersection(lhs: LineSegment, rhs: LineSegment): Point;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lhs | [LineSegment](./calcium.linesegment.md) | A line to intersect. |
|  rhs | [LineSegment](./calcium.linesegment.md) | Another line to intersect. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Point](./calcium.point.md)
